Departments

City Manager's Office The City Manager's Office is responsible for the implementation of policy established by the City of South Padre Island's City Council. (956) 761-8110  Shoreline Department Shoreline Management is responsible for preserving and restoring the local beaches. (956) 761-8111  Convention & Visitors Bureau The South Padre Island Convention & Visitors Bureau (CVB) is an excellent resource for anyone planning to visit South Padre Island. (956) 761-3000  Planning Department Current priorities and focus areas for the bureau includes: Comprehensive Long Range Planning, Zoning Administration, Regulatory modernization; (956) 761-8112  Emergency Management The Emergency Management Team is responsible for the coordination of the City's emergency planning, training, response, and recovery efforts of major disasters. (956) 761-3830  Environmental Health Services We serve the public by assuring compliance with local ordinances; respond to calls for service; enforce local ordinances or state law regarding health issues; and to prevent and detect ordinance violations. (956) 761-8123  Finance Department The Department is responsible for all financial and accounting services and various financial reports-both internal and external. (956) 761-8130  Fire Department The City of South Padre Island Fire Department is committed to providing a superior level of emergency service that continually improves the quality of life, health, and safety of our residents and visitors. (956) 761-3040  Human Resources The Human Resources Division for the City of South Padre Island serves as a business partner working with all departments within the City to serve our internal and external communities with integrity, professionalism and the highest level of customer service while providing a variety of services. (956) 761-8140  Information Technology The Information Technology Department supports all City Departments, networking and computer related infrastructure, software, and services. (956) 761-8134  Municipal Court The Municipal Court's primary function is to process all Class C Criminal charges filed by the Police Department and Code Enforcement Officers alleged to have occurred within the city limits of the City of South Padre Island. These include charges filed under the Texas Transportation Code, Penal Code, Alcoholic Beverage Code, Health and Safety Code, Education Code, and the City of South Padre Island Code of Ordinances. (956) 761-8137  Police Department The South Padre Island Police Department is committed to providing professional and effective police services to our citizens and visitors alike. (956) 761-5454 Public Information The Public Information Office directs the City's communication efforts by increasing awareness of government services and activities (956) 761-8106  Public Works The Public Works Department works to maintain the quality of the City's infrastructure such as streets, parks, green spaces, and the beach. (956) 761-8159  Public Transit Island Metro is a FREE fixed route system that operates within the City of South Padre Island and Port Isabel. (956) 761-8178  Parks and Recreation Welcome to the City of South Padre Island Parks and Recreation Department Home Page. (956) 761-8168  Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) Building Department (956) 761-3898
